<!-- DO NOT EDIT: Generated from iris.sdf.jinja -->
<sdf version='1.6'>
  <model name='iris'>
    <link name='base_link'>
      <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
      <inertial>
        <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
        <mass>1.5</mass>
        <inertia>
          <ixx>0.029125</ixx>
          <ixy>0</ixy>
          <ixz>0</ixz>
          <iyy>0.029125</iyy>
          <iyz>0</iyz>
          <izz>0.055225</izz>
        </inertia>
      </inertial>
      <collision name='base_link_inertia_collision'>
        <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
        <geometry>
          <box>
            <size>0.47 0.47 0.11</size>
          </box>
        </geometry>
        <surface>
          <contact>
            <ode>
              <min_depth>0.001</min_depth>
              <max_vel>0</max_vel>
            </ode>
          </contact>
          <friction>
            <ode/>
          </friction>
        </surface>
      </collision>

          <mesh>
            <scale>1 1 1</scale>
            <uri>model://iris/meshes/iris.stl</uri>
          </mesh>
        </geometry>

          <script>
            <name>Gazebo/DarkGrey</name>
            <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
          </script>
        </material>
      </visual>
      <gravity>1</gravity>
      <velocity_decay/>
    </link>

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<robot xmlns:xacro="http://www.ros.org/wiki/xacro" name="crazyflie">

  <!-- Base footprint link (dummy root) -->
  <link name="base_footprint"/>

  <!-- Crazyflie body macro -->
  <xacro:macro name="base_link" params="mesh_package mass box_size_x box_size_y box_size_z">
    <link name="base_link">
      <!-- Inertial properties -->
      <inertial>
        <origin xyz="0 0 0.017425" rpy="0 0 0"/>
        <mass value="${mass}"/>
        <inertia 
          ixx="1.6571710e-05" iyy="1.6655602e-05" izz="2.9261652e-05"
          ixy="8.30806e-07" ixz="7.18277e-07" iyz="1.800197e-06"/>
      </inertial>

      <!-- Collision geometry -->
      <collision name="body_collision">
        <origin xyz="0 0 0.017425" rpy="0 0 0"/>
        <geometry>
          <box size="${box_size_x} ${box_size_y} ${box_size_z}"/>
        </geometry>
      </collision>

      <!-- Visual geometry -->
      <visual name="body_visual">
        <origin xyz="0 0 0.017425" rpy="0 0 0"/>
        <geometry>
          <mesh filename="file://$(find crazyflie_description)/meshes/collada_files/cf2_assembly.dae"/>
        </geometry>
      </visual>
    </link>
  </xacro:macro>

  <!-- Propeller macro -->
  <xacro:macro name="crazyflie_prop" params="prop_name mesh_package mass mesh_file">
    <link name="${prop_name}">
      <inertial>
        <mass value="${mass}"/>
        <inertia ixx="8.33333e-09" iyy="1.08333e-07" izz="1.13333e-07" ixy="0.0" ixz="0.0" iyz="0.0"/>
      </inertial>

      <visual>
        <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="0 0 0"/>
        <geometry>
          <mesh filename="file://$(find crazyflie_description)/meshes/collada_files/${mesh_file}"/>
        </geometry>
      </visual>

      <collision>
        <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="0 0 0"/>
        <geometry>
          <mesh filename="file://$(find crazyflie_description)/meshes/collada_files/${mesh_file}"/>
        </geometry>
      </collision>
    </link>
  </xacro:macro>

  <!-- Motor plugin parameters as xacro properties -->
  <xacro:property name="robot_ns" value="crazyflie"/>
  <xacro:property name="max_rot_velocity" value="2618"/>
  <xacro:property name="motor_constant" value="1.28192e-08"/>
  <xacro:property name="moment_constant" value="0.005964552"/>
  <xacro:property name="rotor_drag_coefficient" value="8.06428e-05"/>
  <xacro:property name="rolling_moment_coefficient" value="0.0000001"/>
  <xacro:property name="rotor_velocity_slowdown_sim" value="20"/>

  <!-- Multicopter Velocity Control Plugin Parameters -->
  <xacro:property name="control_command_topic" value="gazebo/command/twist"/>
  <xacro:property name="control_enable_topic" value="enable"/>
  <xacro:property name="control_velocity_gain" value="1.25 1.25 0.2425"/>
  <xacro:property name="control_attitude_gain" value="0.02 0.02 0.02"/>
  <xacro:property name="control_angular_rate_gain" value="0.005 0.005 0.005"/>
  <xacro:property name="control_force_constant" value="1.28192e-08"/>
  <xacro:property name="control_moment_constant" value="0.005964552"/>

  <!-- Instantiate body -->
  <xacro:base_link 
    mesh_package="crazyflie_description" 
    mass="0.025" 
    box_size_x="0.10" 
    box_size_y="0.10" 
    box_size_z="0.03485"/>

  <!-- Instantiate propellers -->
  <xacro:crazyflie_prop prop_name="m1_prop" mesh_package="crazyflie_description" mass="0.0008" mesh_file="ccw_prop.dae"/>
  <xacro:crazyflie_prop prop_name="m2_prop" mesh_package="crazyflie_description" mass="0.0008" mesh_file="cw_prop.dae"/>
  <xacro:crazyflie_prop prop_name="m3_prop" mesh_package="crazyflie_description" mass="0.0008" mesh_file="ccw_prop.dae"/>
  <xacro:crazyflie_prop prop_name="m4_prop" mesh_package="crazyflie_description" mass="0.0008" mesh_file="cw_prop.dae"/>

  <!-- Fixed joint between base_footprint and body -->
  <joint name="base_to_body" type="fixed">
    <parent link="base_footprint"/>
    <child link="base_link"/>
  </joint>

  <!-- Joints between body and props -->
  <joint name="body_to_m1_prop" type="continuous">
    <parent link="base_link"/>
    <child link="m1_prop"/>
    <origin xyz="0.031 -0.031 0.021" rpy="0 0 0"/>
    <axis xyz="0 0 1"/>
    <limit effort="1.0" velocity="120.0"/>
  </joint>

  <joint name="body_to_m2_prop" type="continuous">
    <parent link="base_link"/>
    <child link="m2_prop"/>
    <origin xyz="-0.031 -0.031 0.021" rpy="0 0 0"/>
    <axis xyz="0 0 1"/>
    <limit effort="1.0" velocity="120.0"/>
  </joint>

  <joint name="body_to_m3_prop" type="continuous">
    <parent link="base_link"/>
    <child link="m3_prop"/>
    <origin xyz="-0.031 0.031 0.021" rpy="0 0 0"/>
    <axis xyz="0 0 1"/>
    <limit effort="1.0" velocity="120.0"/>
  </joint>

  <joint name="body_to_m4_prop" type="continuous">
    <parent link="base_link"/>
    <child link="m4_prop"/>
    <origin xyz="0.031 0.031 0.021" rpy="0 0 0"/>
    <axis xyz="0 0 1"/>
    <limit effort="1.0" velocity="120.0"/>
  </joint>

  <gazebo>
    <plugin
      filename="gz-sim-multicopter-control-system"
      name="gz::sim::systems::MulticopterVelocityControl">
      <robotNamespace>${robot_ns}</robotNamespace>
      <commandSubTopic>${control_command_topic}</commandSubTopic>
      <enableSubTopic>${control_enable_topic}</enableSubTopic>
      <comLinkName>base_footprint</comLinkName>
      <velocityGain>${control_velocity_gain}</velocityGain>
      <attitudeGain>${control_attitude_gain}</attitudeGain>
      <angularRateGain>${control_angular_rate_gain}</angularRateGain>
      <rotorConfiguration>
        <rotor>
          <jointName>body_to_m1_prop</jointName>
          <forceConstant>${control_force_constant}</forceConstant>
          <momentConstant>${control_moment_constant}</momentConstant>
          <direction>1</direction>
        </rotor>
        <rotor>
          <jointName>body_to_m2_prop</jointName>
          <forceConstant>${control_force_constant}</forceConstant>
          <momentConstant>${control_moment_constant}</momentConstant>
          <direction>-1</direction>
        </rotor>
        <rotor>
          <jointName>body_to_m3_prop</jointName>
          <forceConstant>${control_force_constant}</forceConstant>
          <momentConstant>${control_moment_constant}</momentConstant>
          <direction>1</direction>
        </rotor>
        <rotor>
          <jointName>body_to_m4_prop</jointName>
          <forceConstant>${control_force_constant}</forceConstant>
          <momentConstant>${control_moment_constant}</momentConstant>
          <direction>-1</direction>
        </rotor>
      </rotorConfiguration>
    </plugin>
    <plugin filename="gz-sim-multicopter-motor-model-system" name="gz::sim::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
      <robotNamespace>${robot_ns}</robotNamespace>
      <jointName>body_to_m1_prop</jointName>
      <linkName>m1_prop</linkName>
      <turningDirection>ccw</turningDirection>
      <maxRotVelocity>${max_rot_velocity}</maxRotVelocity>
      <motorConstant>${motor_constant}</motorConstant>
      <momentConstant>${moment_constant}</momentConstant>
      <rotorDragCoefficient>${rotor_drag_coefficient}</rotorDragCoefficient>
      <rollingMomentCoefficient>${rolling_moment_coefficient}</rollingMomentCoefficient>
      <rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>${rotor_velocity_slowdown_sim}</rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>
      <actuator_number>0</actuator_number>
      <motorType>velocity</motorType>
    </plugin>
    <plugin filename="gz-sim-multicopter-motor-model-system" name="gz::sim::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
      <robotNamespace>${robot_ns}</robotNamespace>
      <jointName>body_to_m2_prop</jointName>
      <linkName>m2_prop</linkName>
      <turningDirection>cw</turningDirection>
      <maxRotVelocity>${max_rot_velocity}</maxRotVelocity>
      <motorConstant>${motor_constant}</motorConstant>
      <momentConstant>${moment_constant}</momentConstant>
      <rotorDragCoefficient>${rotor_drag_coefficient}</rotorDragCoefficient>
      <rollingMomentCoefficient>${rolling_moment_coefficient}</rollingMomentCoefficient>
      <rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>${rotor_velocity_slowdown_sim}</rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>
      <actuator_number>1</actuator_number>
      <motorType>velocity</motorType>
    </plugin>
    <plugin filename="gz-sim-multicopter-motor-model-system" name="gz::sim::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
      <robotNamespace>${robot_ns}</robotNamespace>
      <jointName>body_to_m3_prop</jointName>
      <linkName>m3_prop</linkName>
      <turningDirection>ccw</turningDirection>
      <maxRotVelocity>${max_rot_velocity}</maxRotVelocity>
      <motorConstant>${motor_constant}</motorConstant>
      <momentConstant>${moment_constant}</momentConstant>
      <rotorDragCoefficient>${rotor_drag_coefficient}</rotorDragCoefficient>
      <rollingMomentCoefficient>${rolling_moment_coefficient}</rollingMomentCoefficient>
      <rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>${rotor_velocity_slowdown_sim}</rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>
      <actuator_number>2</actuator_number>
      <motorType>velocity</motorType>
    </plugin>
    <plugin filename="gz-sim-multicopter-motor-model-system" name="gz::sim::systems::MulticopterMotorModel">
      <robotNamespace>${robot_ns}</robotNamespace>
      <jointName>body_to_m4_prop</jointName>
      <linkName>m4_prop</linkName>
      <turningDirection>cw</turningDirection>
      <maxRotVelocity>${max_rot_velocity}</maxRotVelocity>
      <motorConstant>${motor_constant}</motorConstant>
      <momentConstant>${moment_constant}</momentConstant>
      <rotorDragCoefficient>${rotor_drag_coefficient}</rotorDragCoefficient>
      <rollingMomentCoefficient>${rolling_moment_coefficient}</rollingMomentCoefficient>
      <rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>${rotor_velocity_slowdown_sim}</rotorVelocitySlowdownSim>
      <actuator_number>3</actuator_number>
      <motorType>velocity</motorType>
    </plugin>
  </gazebo>
</robot>
